mapper.select: select * from user where 1=1 and name = #{userName} and password = #{password}

select menu.text,menu.url,menu.parent_id,menu.id,menu.m_id from menu inner join role_menu on role_menu.menu_id=menu.id inner join role on role.id = role_menu.role_id inner join user_role on user_role.role_id = role.id inner join user on user.id = user_role.user_id where 1=1 and user.id = #{userId}
